Fonts

By default Neptuno use Roboto font, we also have: pt-sans and arsenal like secondary fonts.

Roboto font

PT Sans font

Arsenal font

Ubuntu font

Bubblegum font

<p class="roboto">Roboto font</p>

<p class="arsenal">Arsenal font</p>
